cards.name: Donella Hornwood
cards.text: Reduce the cost of the first loyal card you marshal or play each round by 1.
cards.flavor: Poor wan Lady Hornwood sat beside him, her face a stony mask as she picked listlessly at her food.

cards.name: Fear Cuts Deeper Than Swords
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an ability that chooses a [stark] character you control as its only target would initiate, cancel those effects and stand that character.
cards.flavor: Strong as a bear. Fierce as a wolverine. Fear cuts deeper than swords.

cards.name: Knight of Summer
cards.text: While there are more Summer plot cards than Winter plot cards revealed, Knight of Summer gets +2 STR and gains renown.
cards.flavor: "...they are the knights of summer, and winter is coming." <cite>Catelyn Stark</cite>

cards.name: There Is My Claim
cards.text: Play only during a challenge. Challenges Action: Reveal 4 [tyrell] characters from your hand to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Dolorous Edd
cards.text: Action: During an [intrigue] challenge in which you are the defending player, kneel your faction card to put Dolorous Edd into play from your hand knelt, participating as a defender. If you win the challenge, you may return him to your hand.
cards.flavor: "I never wanted to see half the things I've seen, and I've never seen half the things I wanted to. I don't think wanting comes into it."

cards.name: Craven
cards.text:
Terminal.
Attached character cannot be declared as an attacker.
cards.flavor: "A craven can be as brave as any man, when there is nothing to fear." <cite>Maester Aemon</cite>

cards.name: Maester Pylos
cards.text: Stealth.
cards.flavor: Pylos seemed clever and diligent and well-meaning, but he was so young, and the king did not confide in him as he had in Cressen.

cards.name: The Stone Drum
cards.text: While there is a Kingdom plot card revealed, increase the gold value on your revealed plot card by 1.
cards.flavor: Dragonstone's central keep, so named for the way its ancient walls boomed and rumbled during storms.

cards.name: Shae
cards.text: Challenges Action: Pay 1 gold to stand Shae. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: The Boy King
cards.text: Lord character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Reaction: After a character with printed cost 3 or lower is killed, kneel The Boy King to have attached character gain 1 power.

cards.name: Balon Greyjoy
cards.text: Renown. Balon Greyjoy does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge against an opponent who does not control a King character. Action: Kneel a [greyjoy] location to give each loyal character you control +1 STR until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

cards.name: Ours is the Old Way
cards.text: Challenges Action: Until the end of the phase, either: each [greyjoy] character you control gains stealth, or each non-[greyjoy] character loses stealth.

cards.name: Doreah
cards.text: During a challenge in which you control a participating Lord or Lady character, Doreah gains insight.
cards.flavor: "Once there were two moons in the sky, but one wandered too close to the sun and cracked from the heat. A thousand thousand dragons poured forth, and drunk the fire of the sun. That is why dragons breathe flame."

cards.name: Beggar King
cards.text: [targaryen] character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Reaction: After an opponent reveals a plot card with a higher printed gold value than yours, kneel Beggar King to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if no opponent controls a King character.)

cards.name: Starfall Cavalry
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After Starfall Cavalry enters play, draw 1 card. (3 cards instead if there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile.)

cards.name: Venomous Blade
cards.text: [martell] character you control only. Ambush (3). Attached character gets +1 STR. Reaction: After Venomous Blade enters play, place a poison token on a character with printed STR 2 or lower. At the end of the phase, if that character still has that poison token, remove it and kill that character.

cards.name: Kings of Summer
cards.text: You cannot include Winter plot cards in your plot deck. Increase the reserve value on each player's revealed plot card by 1. While there are no Winter plot cards revealed, increase the gold value on your revealed Summer plot card by 1.

cards.name: Kings of Winter
cards.text: You cannot include Summer plot cards in your plot deck. Reduce the reserve value on each player's revealed plot card by 1. While you have a Winter plot card revealed, reduce the gold value on each opponent's non-Summer plot card by 1.

cards.name: Summer Harvest
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. X is 2 higher than the printed gold value on that player's revealed plot card.

cards.name: Winter Festival
cards.text: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if there are no Summer plot cards revealed, gain 2 power for your faction.
